summary: Senior Machine Learning Engineer with 12+ years of experience in designing and implementing scalable ML systems. Expert in cloud architecture, real-time data processing, and microservices design.

experience.title: Principal Software Architect & ML Engineering Lead
description: Led architecture and development of a next-generation recommendation engine that increased user engagement by 42%.
Designed and implemented a cloud-native, microservices-based platform that reduced infrastructure costs by 35%.
Architected a scalable data pipeline handling 10TB of daily data, reducing processing latency from hours to minutes.
Spearheaded the adoption of MLOps practices across the organization, reducing model deployment time from weeks to hours.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer, Machine Learning
description: Developed an automated anomaly detection system for IoT sensor data that reduced false alarms by 75%.
Built a distributed stream processing platform handling 1M+ events per second with sub-second latency.
Implemented a continuous training pipeline for ML models that improved model accuracy by 25%.
Led integration of federated learning techniques that preserved user privacy while improving model performance by 30%.

experience.title: Software Engineer, Backend Services
description: Built high-throughput API services handling 50,000+ requests per second with 99.99% availability.
Implemented distributed caching solution that reduced database load by 65%.
Developed comprehensive monitoring and alerting system that reduced MTTR from hours to minutes.
Created automated deployment pipelines that reduced deployment time from days to minutes.
